meanings.definition: The quality of being appropriate or suitable.
meanings.sent1: Her properness in choosing the right outfit for the occasion was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The teacher emphasized the importance of properness in behavior during the school assembly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's properness in always sitting on the cleanest spot on the couch made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The properness of the painting's colors created a harmonious and pleasing effect.
meanings.sent5: The properness of his manners left a lasting impression on the guests.

meanings.definition: The state of being correct or accurate.
meanings.sent1: The properness of the answer was evident from the student's confident tone.
meanings.sent2: In science, it is crucial to strive for properness in conducting experiments.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke about the properness of a cat wearing a hat was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The properness of the map's directions led them safely to their destination.
meanings.sent5: His properness in following the rules earned him the title of the most reliable team member.
